thread.title: SEE IT: Roger Goodell drowned out by boos from Patriots fans
thread.title_full: SEE IT: Roger Goodell drowned out by boos from Patriots fans

author: NICHOLAS PARCO
title: SEE IT: Roger Goodell drowned out by boos from Patriots fans
text:
04 PM 
Revenge is sweet. 
Patriots fans have vocally expressed their hatred of Roger Goodell since the end of the Deflategate scandal, and they finally let the NFL Commissioner hear it to his face in Houston after Super Bowl LI. 
As soon as Goodell appeared during the Lombardi Trophy ceremony following the Patriots' unbelievable 34-28 overtime victory, the cheers at NRG Stadium for players turned to seas of boos for the commish. Roger Goodell gets CRUSHED with boos pic.twitter.com/QRr9sFhgzd â€” Will Brinson (@WillBrinson) February 6, 2017 
Goodell had made it a point to avoid seeing the Patriots play in person since Deflategate, even opting to watch both Falcons playoff games leading up to the Super Bowl rather than going to Gilette Stadium to see Tom Brady and co. Tags:
